climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: Quality, Organic Toddler Formula: Our Pea Protein Powder Formula is dairy free, soy free, lactose free, and gluten free, making it an excellent option for families who prefer a vegetarian diet with plant based protein without the use of any soy proteins.
An Excellent Solution For Food Allergies: Our formula is also a great choice for children with food allergies or intolerances to dairy, soy, wheat, gluten, tree nut, or corn proteins.

Give Your Toddler A Better Start To Life: We know how important it is to give your toddler only high-quality, organic ingredients. Our Pea Protein Toddler Drink is free of corn syrup, palm oil, and hexane-processed DHA, so you can feel confident you're providing your little one with clean ingredients.
Superior Nutrition For Your Little One: Our formula is intended for toddlers 1 year and older or as directed by a healthcare professional.
We're Committed To Purity: Your little one means the world to you, and that means the world to us. That’s why we hold every product we create to the highest purity and quality standards possible.
body.description: Baby's Only Organic Toddler Formula stands out as a top choice for parents seeking a plant-based option. This formula is a versatile solution for families adhering to a vegetarian diet without incorporating soy proteins, or for children with allergies or intolerances to dairy, soy, wheat, gluten, tree nut, or corn proteins. Designed for toddlers aged 1 year and older, our vitamin D toddler formula plays a crucial role in supporting the ongoing growth and development of toddlers. Whether transitioning from breast or formula feeding, this product delivers a comprehensive array of essential nutrients, ensuring that children continue to receive the nutrition they need during this critical stage of life. Importantly, we’re committed to the highest standards of quality and nutritional integrity for our baby & toddler formula. Parents can trust that this formula contains only premium ingredients, free from less desirable additives like organic corn syrup, organic palm oil, and hexane-processed DHA, safeguarding the well-being of their children while maintaining a commitment to organic standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative but hard to find
reviews.reviewText: My baby, currently a year old now, has exclusively been using this formula since she was 6-7MOS after being breastfeed (BF & personal complications) While trying adjust what I was eating during BF and the many formulas we tried to see which didn’t give her an allergic reaction; this was a winner. We tried other plant based formulas but she either didn’t take it likely, the main ingredient were corn or soy fillers (which we didn’t like) we needed something that was pure, no added fillers, gluten free and dairy free. The only downside of this formula is that it is soo difficult to find in our area. No one carries the pea formula (target, Walmat, cvs, Walgreens, HEB, any other grocery store) has it. Besides wholefood, which has a limit to how much you can buy. The other option is ordering it online. Also that it dsnt come in any other sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We’ve been using this since my son was 6 months old. It’s been working great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This a life saver. THANKS
reviews.reviewText: My baby had an intolerance to every formula she tried and believe me there were many, each and every one of them gave her diarrhea, blood in her stools. My baby was unhappy until we went to see a gastroenterologist and he told us to try this formula and I can tell you from an unhappy 50-day-old baby, with a severe diaper rash to a 48-hour later a happy baby who even smiles because her stomach feels relief , I know it says toddler but investigate why (the company wants to promote breastfeeding as the main and most important thing for babies). It is difficult to dissolve in water but I prepare several shots in a nutribullet and make my life easier. I know that all babies are a world apart but I cannot thank this company more for creating this formula that brought happiness back to my baby and me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent alternative for milk/dairy allergies
reviews.reviewText: Our infant is allergic to cow/goat milk (even when Mama eats dairy products) so we gave this a chance. It did not disappoint. It mixes well, tastes fine, our baby likes it, and no allergic reactions to any ingredients!We started her on it a bit younger than recommended, but many "toddler" baby formulas want you to wait....sorry FDA or whatever gov't org, but babies can have allergies at any age, and babies can't wait 6 months until they reach the age you want them to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for our allergy baby
reviews.reviewText: Our son has a corn sensitivity and therefore can’t tolerate most formulas. We switched him to this from Alimentum RTF after the GI doctor recommended it. He has tolerated it really well and the cost is much less than Alimentum RTF.It can be clumpy and hard to mix. I make a big batch in the blender in the morning and use the liquid throughout the day. It’s just easier but probably not totally necessaryAlso- someone mentioned the smell. I personally find this one much more tolerable than the other allergy special formulas like Nutramigen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Good plant based formula for vegan babies if ur unable to breastfeed or ur toddler still takes a bottle , 4 starts because it can get clumpy and hard to mix and can sometimes make my baby constipated if he doesn't have enough liquids after. But all in all great substitute if ur dairy free or soy free..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I wish this worked for my little
reviews.reviewText: I had high hopes for this for my baby that has a lactose issue we think.. but it didn't work for us. My baby was suffering with massive runny poops... so her provider recommended a dairy free formula and I didn't really want to go the soy route so I tried this first. It caused her to be super constipated even when we were mixing it in at 1/4 ratio (3/4 regular formula 1/4 this one). We tried this for about 2 weeks and that was enough for me. You do need to mix it in hot water for it to more easily mix in... if I did it with just warm water it took forever for the formula to actually dissolve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best you'll ever find
reviews.reviewText: I've been feeding this protein to my new born baby in combination with breast-milk and we love it. My first born was to fussy all the time with the common formulas that contain taurine. But my second born is more calm never fussy sleeps a lot and is growing strong. Thank God for this product.
